hols.title: Container Native Application Development
hols.description: Learn Infrastructure as Code leveraging Terraform, Kubernetes, Wercker, HELM, Docker, Github and the Oracle Cloud Infrastructure.

hols.title: Containerized Development with Docker
hols.description: Learn how to leverage Docker, Microservices and Oracle inside containers for rapid application development.

hols.title: Database Cloud Service for DBA's
hols.description: Learn how to leverage quickly create, manage and migrate data into the Database Cloud Service.

hols.title: Devops Cloud Native Microservices
hols.description: Create a Software Development Lifecycle (SDLC) for a Cloud Native project that will create and use several Microservices.

hols.title: Devops Cloud Native Microservices with MySQL
hols.description: Create a Software Development Lifecycle (SDLC) for a Cloud Native project that will create and use several Microservices leveraging a MySQL backend database.

hols.title: Java Cloud Service with Stack Manager
hols.description: Learn how to implement Infrastructure as Code for a Struts application using Stack Manager and the Java Cloud Service.
